sentences.en: And , dying, it rises above its own agony to outcarol the lark and the nightingale.
sentences.cn: 它超脱了垂死的剧痛, 歌声胜过百灵和夜莺.

sentences.en: At the moment, the English bear the name, Nightingale in mind.
sentences.cn: 这时候, 英国人民都在呼唤着南丁格尔的名字.

sentences.en: But the nightingale is the best of all, he read.
sentences.cn: “但夜莺是其中最好的, ”他看到这一段文字.

sentences.en: Even from the first, the words went wrong , the catbird pecked away the nightingale.
sentences.cn: 一开始字里行间就漏洞百出, 猫声鸟居然把夜莺啄得铩羽而归.

sentences.en: Florence Nightingale came from a rich family and was very pretty.
sentences.cn: 弗罗伦斯·南丁格尔出身富有家庭,相貌俊俏.

sentences.en: Florence Nightingale was basically arguing for prevention rather than cure.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伦斯·南丁格尔的基本主张是防患于未然.

sentences.en: I looked out for you as a nightingale looks out for the cherry garden, - sighed the sixth.
sentences.cn: 第六个女儿喊道：“我就像夜莺盼望着樱花园一样，整天张望着您。”

sentences.en: I shall not hear the nightingale Sing on as if in pain.
sentences.cn: 听不见那夜莺如泣如诉的哀曲.

sentences.en: If you know about Nightingale, what else can I possibly tell you?
sentences.cn: 如果你知道夜莺我还能告诉你什么?

sentences.en: In the dead of night I heard the singing of a nightingale.
sentences.cn: 深夜我听到了夜莺的歌唱.

sentences.en: Jardine Matheson Group Managing Director Anthony Nightingale ( right ) speaks at the contest.
sentences.cn: 怡和集团常务董事黎定基 ( 右 ) 在比赛中致词.

sentences.en: Let me introduce you to my friend Nightingale.
sentences.cn: 让我把你介绍给我的朋友南丁格尔.

sentences.en: Men don't buy the Florence Nightingale garbage they teach in nursing school.
sentences.cn: 男性不会接受护理学校传授的弗洛伦斯·南丁格尔那陈旧的一套.

sentences.en: On her return to England people greeted Florence Nightingale as a heroine.
sentences.cn: 当她返回英国时,人们把弗罗伦斯·南丁格尔作为女英雄来欢迎.

sentences.en: Those were the words written by British medical worker Florence Nightingale.
sentences.cn: 以上是英国著名医学工作者“佛罗伦萨南丁格尔”所写下的一段话.

sentences.en: You got a collar in here for the Nightingale murders?
sentences.cn: 你们抓到南丁格尔命案的嫌犯了?

phrases.tran_cn: 弗洛伦斯·南丁格尔（英国护士）

trans.tran_en: a small bird that sings very beautifully, especially at night
